item.title: Reflections on Retros
item.description: Without care the Scrum Retrospective format becomes ineffective. Hallmarks include actions without owners, avoidance of difficult conversations, and productivity stagnation. I prefer to take proactive steps to adjust the team environment. I do this by taking action and directly talking to stakeholders. That could mean engaging with delivery managers, creating Architectural Decision Records, or promoting best practice through pairing. But lets not endorse the heliocentric model of meetings, those earlier in their careers appreciate structure to help support their growth.
